page.title: 13Interview with R.Halling
page.content: Q"What made you become a councillor?"A"A little bit of ego a lot of affection for Tring thinking that there are a lot of things that I could improve and that I would like to defend ."Q" How many years were you the school governer ."A" 3 to 4 years."Q" How many years were you involved with the Donkey Derby ."A" I did it for the first five years with lots of people helping but I just do the microphone now."Q"Did you enjoy being a councillor?"A"Yes,I enjoyed all my jobs"Q"Is Tring different now from when you first moved here?"A"Oh yes,there are a lot of different new estates."
